articles.title: NASCAR Stock Car Looks Ridiculous, Goes Fast at Le Mans - Road & Track
articles.description: The Hendrick Motorsports-run NASCAR Garage56 program is off to an excellent start. The team's Camaro stock car also looks comically out of place on track.
articles.content: This year's hotly anticipated 24 Hours of Le Mans will be remembered for two things. At the front, four new factory entries debuting in the same season mean that the hundredth anniversary race promis… [+2387 chars]
